ISystemTask Class Reference

ISystemTask is an interface class designed to work with a task manager for starting the system's task and spawning off new tasks as need be. More...

Detailed Description

ISystemTask is an interface class designed to work with a task manager for starting the system's task and spawning off new tasks as need be.

Gets the scene for this task.

Returns:
The scene for this task.

virtual System::Type ISystemTask::GetSystemType ( void   )  [pure virtual]

Gets the system type for this system task.

This is a shortcut to getting the system type without having to go the system first.

Returns:
The type of the system.

Implemented in AITask, ExplosionTask, OGREGraphicsTask, InputTask, HavokPhysicsTask, FireTask, and ScriptingTask.

virtual void ISystemTask::Update ( f32  DeltaTime  )  [pure virtual]

Function informing the task to perform its updates.

Parameters:
DeltaTime The time delta from the last call.

Implemented in AITask, ExplosionTask, OGREGraphicsTask, InputTask, HavokPhysicsTask, FireTask, and ScriptingTask.

virtual Bool ISystemTask::IsPrimaryThreadOnly ( void   )  [pure virtual]

Implementing tasks should return True to indicate that their Update function should only be called from the primary thread. False allows their Update function to be called from an arbitrary thread.

Implemented in AITask, ExplosionTask, OGREGraphicsTask, InputTask, HavokPhysicsTask, FireTask, and ScriptingTask.
